app.title: UploadSoul - Digital Life, Eternal Companion
app.description: UploadSoul - Digital Life Platform, creating your eternal digital companion. Through AI technology to achieve digital immortality, emotional companionship and virtual reality experience.

digitalHuman.title: Digital Humans
digitalHuman.description: Create and interact with digital versions of your loved ones
digitalHuman.createDescription: Create a digital version of your loved ones by uploading photos, voice, and memories

conversation.description: Have conversations with your digital human
conversation.intro: Have a conversation with your digital human using text. Use the voice chat option for spoken conversations.

memories.title: Memories
memories.placeholder: Write a memory or story about this person...
memories.description: These memories help build a more accurate digital representation.

reunionFeatures.title: Open Virtual Reunion
reunionFeatures.description: Invite family members to a virtual reunion where you can all interact with your digital human together.

creation.title: Create Digital Human
creation.description: By uploading photos, voice, videos and precious memories, create a digital version of your loved ones to preserve these memories forever.
creation.photoUploadInstruction: Click or drag and drop photo
creation.voiceUploadInstruction: Upload clear voice recordings for better voice model training
creation.videoUploadInstruction: Videos help create more realistic digital humans
creation.privacyNote: Your data is securely stored and will only be used to create your digital human.
creation.memoryInstruction: Add stories, memories, and characteristics that make this person special
creation.uploadVideos: Click or drag to upload videos
creation.voiceTip1: Upload at least 3 audio samples of the person speaking
creation.voiceTip2: Each clip should be 5-30 seconds in length
creation.voiceTip3: Clear audio without background noise works best
creation.voiceTip4: Samples should capture the person's natural speaking voice

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the World's Leading Digital Emotional Companion Platform
about.intro: UploadSoul is a technology startup registered in Vancouver, Canada, dedicated to building the world's leading digital emotional companion platform based on artificial intelligence and holographic virtual technology. We provide comprehensive, immersive emotional companionship solutions for users.
about.vision: With 'Digital Immortality' and 'Holographic Emotional Companion' as our core competitiveness, UploadSoul has created a new emotional companionship ecosystem by integrating cutting-edge AI, big data, and VR immersive technology. With precise market positioning, advanced technology system, and international strategic layout, we are confident in achieving high-speed growth and capturing a significant share of the global emotional companionship market in the coming years.
about.techInnovationDesc: Integrating cutting-edge AI, big data, and VR immersive technology to create a unique digital emotional ecosystem
about.globalLayoutDesc: International strategic layout, committed to serving global users
about.investmentDesc: Currently conducting angel round financing, looking forward to working with you to jointly promote the new era of digital emotions and achieve win-win development.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to UploadSoul's Privacy Policy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, and other personal information.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access and disclosure.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our platform. You can control cookie settings in your browser.

changes.title: Changes to Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at privacy@uploadsoul.com

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to UploadSoul's Terms of Service. These terms govern your use of our platform and services.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: Key terms used in these terms of service are defined for clarity and understanding.

account.title: Account Terms
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and all activities that occur under your account.

services.title: Services
services.content: We provide digital life services, including digital companions, virtual pets, and digital immortality features.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of your content, but grant us a license to use it for providing our services.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights in our platform and services belong to UploadSoul.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for certain damages.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account if you violate these terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at legal@uploadsoul.com
